title: 1980년 Pilat 사건
summary: 미국 Florida, FL 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Pilat. 판결일: 1980-10-16. 법원: Supreme Court of Florida.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: Vera PILAT v. HOSPITAL DEVELOPMENT AND SERVICE CORP., etc.
**판결일**: 1980-10-16
**법원**: Supreme Court of Florida
**관할**: Florida, FL

**판사**: Adkins, Alderman, Boyd, England, McDonald, Overton, Sundberg

## 변호인

Robert D. Peltz of Rossman & Baumber-ger, Miami, for appellants., Joseph S. Kashi of Grimmett, Conrad, Scherer & James, Fort Lauderdale, and Ellen Mills Gibbs and William Zei of Gibbs & Zei, Fort Lauderdale, for appellees.

## 인용

- 389 So. 2d 637

## 판결문 요약


PER CURIAM.
The trial court’s order dismissing appellants’ complaint is hereby reversed. See Aldana v. Holub, 381 So.2d 231 (Fla.1980).
It is so ordered.
SUNDBERG, C. J., and ADKINS, BOYD, OVERTON, ENGLAND, ALDERMAN and McDONALD, JJ., concur.
...
